chatContactProfilesSubtitle: Adding a Chat Contact Profile enables consumers to quickly find you in Contacts when they have a question regarding your offer, availability or pricing as well as give confidence that your responses are from your brand.
chatSubtitle: Chat offers a two-way dialogue between you and consumers that message your brand directly through the mobile appâ€™s native Chat. Your brand is automatically added to their Contacts list, and a link to contact you is included in every Promotion.
emailInUse: Email address is in use already

exception.ActivePromotionsLimitReached: Limit of live promotions is reached for specified date range.
exception.BrandIdentitiesLimitReached: Limit of used Brand identities is reached for promotions in specified date range.
exception.CantPurchasePAYG: You can't purchase PAYG while having an active subscription.
exception.CantSubscribeToSamePlan: You can't change to the same plan you are currently subscribed to.
exception.ContactIdentitiesLimitReached: Limit of used Chat Contact Profiles is reached for promotions in specified date range.
exception.GeofencesLimitReached: Limit of used Geofences is reached for promotions in specified date range.
exception.PhoneNumberAlreadyInUse: Phone Number is already in use

followStepsToCompleteYourProfile: Follow the simple 4 Steps to complete your profile
geofencingSubtitle: Geofencing is a virtual perimeter around your business's physical location, or maybe even the local station of a competitive business location. When a consumer enters this location, and they have expressed an interest in offers from brands like yours, your promotional offers are delivered to them in real-time.
name: Name
notAbleToUndoThisAction: You will not be able to undo this action.
offerIdentityProfilesSubtitle: Adding your brands Offer Identity Profile enables consumers that receive your offer to instantly associate with your brand in their Offer Inbox. You should use an image that strongly represents your brand image.
offersPerformanceSubtitle: This panel shows performance of all of your promotions over the time period selected from the drop-down menu.
promotionsSubtitle: Promotions enable you to deliver offers to consumers via the mobile app. When a user has set and interest in offers from brands like yours, these offers are delivered when they enter a location you have specified using a geofence.
recentPromotionsSubtitle: This panel shows all recently live promotions over the time period selected from the drop-down menu.
youMustEnterEmailAndPassword: You must enter email and password.
